title: DC Attorney General Alleges NFL Covered Up Commanders’ Wrongdoing
description: The civil complaint, filed against the N.F.L., Commissioner Roger Goodell, the Washington Commanders and the team’s owner, Daniel Snyder, takes aim at the league’s investigation into workplace harassment.
dc:creator: Juliet Macur, Ken Belson and Jenny Vrentas
media:description: Karl Racine, attorney general of the District of Columbia, said Thursday he was filing a lawsuit against the Washington Commanders and the N.F.L.
